products.name: Ethiopian Yirgacheffe
products.description: A bright and floral single-origin coffee with notes of lemon, bergamot, and honey. Grown at high altitudes in the birthplace of coffee.

products.name: Colombian Supremo
products.description: A classic medium roast with rich chocolate and caramel notes. Well-balanced with a smooth finish.

products.name: French Roast Blend
products.description: A bold, dark roast blend with smoky undertones and a full body. Perfect for those who love intense coffee.

products.name: Costa Rican Tarrazú
products.description: A bright, clean coffee with citrus acidity and chocolate sweetness. Grown in the famous Tarrazú region.

products.name: House Blend
products.description: Our signature blend combining beans from three continents. Balanced, approachable, and perfect for everyday drinking.

products.name: Kenyan AA
products.description: A bold, wine-like coffee with black currant notes and bright acidity. One of Africa's finest coffees.

products.name: Espresso Roast
products.description: A rich, full-bodied blend specifically crafted for espresso. Creates beautiful crema with notes of dark chocolate and spice.

products.name: Guatemala Antigua
products.description: A complex coffee with spicy and smoky notes, complemented by chocolate sweetness. Grown in volcanic soil.

products.name: Premium Coffee Pods - Medium Roast
products.description: Convenient single-serve pods compatible with most pod machines. Our house blend in pod form.

products.name: Premium Coffee Pods - Dark Roast
products.description: Bold and intense single-serve pods. Our French roast blend in convenient pod form.

products.name: Brazilian Santos
products.description: A low-acidity coffee with nutty and chocolate notes. Perfect for those who prefer a mellow cup.

products.name: Decaf Colombian
products.description: All the flavor of our Colombian Supremo without the caffeine. Decaffeinated using the Swiss Water Process.
